text:
The abject failure & refusal of #British & #Irish #Media & #Gov'ts & of @EU_Commission to shine light on the availability of the #Russian #CoVid19 #Sputnik #Vaccine to #EU & #British nationals is simply staggering when we consider its lack of any side-affects!
